title: Why am i still banned
body: this is rubbish. what time schedule are they using. I've done my 14 days and i got banned in the arvo. wtf am i still banned. i feel like a moron for dumping any money into this game.

replies.body: I sense you have been properly reformed, I'll enjoy seeing you back on the rift ruining future games.
Bans are lifted after a certain time has passed, rather simply on the midnight of that day. This means that if you were banned at 8PM, your ban would be lifted at 8PM 14 days later.
From what I have looked up on oce.op.gg. Your last game was 13 days ago. Not 14 days yet. It will be from what time you got that ban from.
